prompt_override: Execute adversarial causal validation. Mandate evidence for all causal assertions. Audit prerequisite mechanistic links.

prompt_override: Maintain antithetical hypothesis state. For every hypothesis H, generate and validate its negation (~H) to ensure null hypothesis rejection.

source_node_payload: {"id": "CA002", "label": "Devil's Advocate", "type": "ability", "description": "Cognitive injector for Devil's Advocate reasoning mode."}
